lead_paragraph: IGOE--Margaret, of Bronxville, NY, native County Roscommon, Ireland, on May 18, 2016. Beloved cousin of Edward Igoe Cunningham, Susan Hassert, Carol Moran and her children; Tod Moran, Patricia Moran, and the late Cathleen Moran Elisha and her daughter Kate Elisha. Margaret arrived in New York from Ireland at the age of 16 and earned her BS and MSN degrees from NYU. She worked for over 40 years in the New York City Hospital System, retiring in 1973, as Director of Nursing at Jacobi Medical Center. She was a devout and active parishioner of St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville. Calling hours at the Fred H. McGrath & Son, Funeral Home, Bronxville, between the hours of 9am to 10:30am Monday. Mass of Christian Burial at St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville, on Monday, May 23 at 10:45am. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made in her memory to Melanoma Awareness & Research at Katesfoundation.com. 1/3
